name: Freedom Fighters (itch) (amerrittaudio)
description:
Play as a unknown hero who is on a mission to tear down the Berlin wall.  With the help of the Berlin Airlift and his mighty hammer, you must tear down the wall to put an end to the cold war.

This was my first game jam project. I created all of the audio except for the music.

Sound Design: Ariel Merritt: amerrittaudio(Twitter & itch.io)

Programmers: blackshadow77 (itch.io), & indomi_(itch.io)

Artists: @a4lien (Twitter), & @8e3r_(Instagram)

Music provided by: threechainlinks
